issue.title: [CF 720] Stack and Text Overflowing Icon
issue.body:
Prior to the introduction of the Bar feature there used to be a check box in the Text Layout that allowed text to overflow and Icon. I found that feature quite handy since I tend to get an Icon to Track Absorb Shield on my Tank or even Vengeance.

Is there a way to replicate the feature that I can't find or is there any plan on reintroducing the option to allow the text to overflow ?


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura | Imported from CurseForge issue #720 | Raw

comments.body:
This has been replaced with the ability to be able to set multiple anchors for a text display.

What text layout are you using? Is it a default layout? If not, please post the export string of it, as well as the export string of an icon that uses it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Well I am using the Default Icon Layout for most of my icon.

After posting this I played around with a new Text Layout (Clone of the Default one) and by just removing the option to skin the Stack as the regular Stack it actually allow the text to overflow.


> Posted by CurseForge user InfernalAura

Sounds like you got this all figured out, then.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
